title: Personal Landingpage
shortDesc: I try to build my own personal website to reflect who I am, what I like, what I do and hopefully spark some joy in your life.

title: Slatted Ceiling in the Hallway
shortDesc: 2016 I moved to my current apartment. Since then I am missing a light design in my hallway that I really like. Building a slatted ceiling with integrated LED light strips shall do the deal now.
